nodes.text: The Wipe-3 data-purge grenade manufactured by SoroSuub Corporation was a type of grenade capable of erasing data stored on all devices within its blast radius with a brief, but intense, electromagnetic pulse. Individuals and organizations that wished to keep their data out of enemy hands made use of similar technology.

The Galactic Empire made use of the Wipe-3 in facilities that handled classified materials, and saboteurs and thieves often employed the grenade as a way to cover their tracks and erase important enemy data. However, it was possible to prevent such attacks by hardening systems, but the cost and additional weight were often prohibited.
The Wipe-3 data-purge grenade was mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
